faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about ReportAuto

q1.question: What data sources does ReportAuto support?
q1.answer: We support 100+ integrations including 1C:Enterprise, Ozon, Wildberries, Yandex.Market, Salesforce, HubSpot, Google Analytics, Stripe, QuickBooks, and custom APIs. Perfect for Russia & CIS markets. If your data source isn't listed, our API can connect almost anything.

q2.question: How secure is my data?
q2.answer: We maintain SOC 2 Type II certification, use end-to-end encryption, and store all data in AWS with multi-region redundancy. Your data is never shared with third parties and you maintain full control.

q3.question: Can I customize the report design?
q3.answer: Yes, completely! Our visual builder lets you customize fonts, colors, logos, layouts, and more. You can also embed custom CSS for advanced styling and create branded templates for your organization.

q4.question: What's the typical setup time?
q4.answer: Most customers have their first automated report running within 30-60 minutes. Our onboarding team can guide you through setup, and we offer pre-built templates for common report types to get you started faster.
